text: Kristina Belova (born 29 November 1998 in Pavlodar) is a Kazakhstani female volleyball player. She is a member of the Kazakhstan women's national volleyball team. She was part of the team at the 2018 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship, and 2018 VTV International Women's Volleyball Cup. She played for Irtysh Kazchrome in 2018. == References == == Other websites == *kristina-belova globalsportsarchive.com *kristina-belova volleyball.ioqt.2019.fivb.com *kristina-belova japan2018.fivb.com *20th-asian- sr-womens-volleyball-championship asianvolleyball.net Category:1998 births Category:Kazakhstani volleyball players Category:Living people
title: Kristina Belova
